title: Insert historical production data for date 2026-02-21 and update master order status

requirements.summary: Ensure ProductionDashboardLivePage automatically refreshes and displays updated production data for date 2026-02-21
acceptanceCriteria: Dashboard automatically refreshes after batch data insertion
Summary cards display updated today's production totals for 2026-02-21
Monthly production summaries reflect the new data
Production trend chart includes the new data point for 2026-02-21
Master order progress section shows total_manufactured=345 and total_dispatched=344
All calculated metrics (remaining, finished stock, completion %) are correct

file_operations.description: Verify that the page correctly fetches and displays production data for the selected date (2026-02-21). Ensure that summary cards aggregate today's production totals from all operations, monthly summaries reflect the new data point, and the production trend chart includes the date 2026-02-21. The master order progress section should display total_manufactured=345 and total_dispatched=344 with correctly calculated derived metrics (remaining=255, finished_stock=1, completion_percentage=57.5). Add automatic query invalidation or refetch logic if needed to ensure the dashboard updates after batch data insertion completes.

requirements.summary: Ensure LiveProductionTable displays all 17 operations with production data for date 2026-02-21
acceptanceCriteria: Table displays all 17 operations for date 2026-02-21
Each operation shows correct today_production value
Each operation shows correct total_completed value
Each operation shows correct dispatched value
in_hand is correctly calculated and displayed as (total_completed - dispatched)
Table loads without errors when 2026-02-21 is selected

file_operations.description: Verify that the table correctly displays all 17 operations (Boxing, Welding/Finishing, Rear Wall, Front Wall, Side Wall, Roof, Rear Door, Blasting & Primer, Final Paint, Gasket, DLM, Plywood, Floor Screw, Decal, Data Plate, Sikha, Black Paint) when date 2026-02-21 is selected. Ensure each row shows the correct today_production, total_completed, dispatched values, and that in_hand is correctly calculated as (total_completed - dispatched). Add error handling to ensure the table loads without errors when the historical date is selected.
